title: Panic at the Disco carnival style type
content:
It appears to be hand-drawn but can anyone tell me if it’s based on a typeface?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [-1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828112722/http:/typophile.com/files/-1.png) | 685.88 KB |

 [‹ Help with a serif - Discovery](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828112722/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42325 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font - fontshop.be ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828112722/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42319 "Go to next forum topic")
author: michelleleclerc

comments.content: [Madame](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828112722/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/madame/?refby=typographica) might be its closest relative in the font world.
